name: MutualAidNetwork
description: 1. Install Python (Ensure you have atlas Python 3 by running python —version) https://www.python.org/downloads/ 2. Install pip(pip is the package installer for Python. You can use pip to install packages from the Python Package Index and other indexes): `curl https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py -o get-pip.py` `python get-pip.py` 3. Install pipenv  `pip3 install pipenv` 4. Clone Repo 5. In repo directory, run `pipenv shell`. This will open up a virtual environment for all your developing 6. Run `pipenv install django djangorestframework django-rest-knox` (This is the Django framework, the REST framework, and the token authentication) 7. You may need to install the Python and MySQL development headers and libraries like so: `brew install mysql-client`
